about.p1: Unlimited creativity, absolute responsibility and 0% fear of learning whatever it takes to be a part of a team's growth and success.
about.p2: Why am I the right developer for your project?
about.p3: I consider myself a healthy competitive person and at the same time very empathetic, I like to help as much as I can, to see the projects I get involved in grow, and to be an important part of their success.
about.p4: I possess leadership characteristics, and I believe that my enthusiasm to keep learning every day is contagious.
about.p5: I am ready to face any challenge.

navinfo.title: ABOUT ME
navinfo.span: Hey! I'll be glad to help your project
